extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites     CISC271 and CISC352 and (BCHM218 or MBIO218) and (BIOL334 or BIOL315)

basic.description: Advanced computational approaches to the problems in molecular biology. Techniques and algorithms for sequence analysis and alignment; molecular databases; protein structure prediction and molecular data mining.
basic.subject: CISC
basic.title: Computational Biology
